pr_title: Create warning for COUNT(DISTINCT) to use approx_distinct

timeline.bodyText: COUNT is an aggregation function so you can add this check in the following block. And let's use standard libraries to check for function FunctionResolution.isCountFunction.
timeline.author: rongrong
